English: Force an uncivilized country to secede their capital to form a colonial concession.
Demand that $RECIPIENT$ secede their capital to form a colonial concession.
Acquire an enemy colonial state for our puppet.
Demand that $RECIPIENT$ secede their colonial state to our puppet.
Force an uncivilized country to give a colonial concession to our puppet.
Demand that $RECIPIENT$ give a colonial concession to our puppet.
